Celebrity

‘The View’ Gets New Studio & Offices, But Rosie O’Donnell Isn’t Pleased Because Now She Shares Space With Alleged Enemy Kelly Ripa!

The women of 'The View' are back and in a brand-new studio and office space. But someone is not too pleased about the new digs.
title: Radar Online
